title: oc6 beta4 - menubar overlaps content when viewing .txt, .htm, .php, .pl or .sh files
body:
## expected behavior

the menubar should show the file name of the opened file and shouldn't overlap the file content, as it is done when opening a .js files:

![20131115_oc_js-file_command_bar_ok](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1555936/6ce0269c-4e9e-11e3-9dff-3fe7954d5cc6.png)

## actual behavior

the menubar doesn't show the file name of an opened file and also overlaps the file content for the mentioned file types:

![20131115_oc_txt-file_command_bar_problem](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1555940/a6ddbddc-4e9e-11e3-9b2e-d8ebb1ec1757.png)
![20131115_oc_htm-file_command_bar_problem](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/2572764/1555941/ae37b722-4e9e-11e3-96d3-cc6569a9f665.png)

## steps to reproduce

1. open a file from the given type and check how the menubar is displayed

## environment:

#### server configuration

os: linux 2.6.24-24
web server: apache2 2.4.6
database: mysql 5.1.72
php version: 5.4.21
owncloud version: 6.0 beta3


#### client configuration

browser: firefox 25.0
operating system: windows 7
